review: For the price, this is a pretty slick piece of equipment.  It does quite a lot!  I have been using it mostly to mirror my phone or my tablet so I can stream TV shows or share photos and slideshows with my photography clients.  It has impressed my clients, and it's very portable, so that's a plus for me!You MUST have an HDMI port on your television, and it MUST be near an open outlet.  I did not expect that I would have to have it connected to a power source, but you do.  Other than that, it works pretty much as advertised.
